timeline.bodyText: Do we want this to be an application singleton or a per project (per IntelliJ window) singleton? I'm guessing the 2nd one. There are several places in the code base where we have per-project singletons. You register them in the plugin's xml file and then have a slightly different singleton getter. See for example FlutterReloadManager.getInstance(Project project).

replies.bodyText: Ack forgot about this! Changed to per-project.
